UserIsAlreadyTaken: Username '{0}' is already taken. Please, try another one.
InvalidUser: Cannot validate user, try loggin again.
CannotCreateOp: We cant proccess the operation, unexpected error. Please, try again.
InvalidId: Id doesnt match with the resource requested
OperationNotFound: Operation not found. Maybe it was deleted, refresh the site
CannotDeleteOp: We cant delete the operation. Maybe it doesnt exist.
